text: Nida Patcharaveerapong (; 13 September 1984 â€” 24 February 2022), also known as Pattaratida Patcharaveerapong (), better known as Tangmo (), was a Thai actress. Her acting career began in 2003. She was known for appearing in many soap operas and drama shows in Thailand. She was born in Bangkok, Thailand. She appeared in The Fallen Leaf, Ghost of Mae Nak and Bangkok Love Stories: Innocence. On 24 February 2022, she fell from a speedboat in Chao Phraya River near Mueang Nonthaburi, Thailand. Her body was found two days later. She was 37 years old. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Thai actors Category:Accidental deaths by drowning Category:People from Bangkok
title: Nida Patcharaveerapong
